data.actual_result: The server will only be selected if you click on the lower corners of the expanded icon.
data.expected_result: The server will be selected no matter where you click.
data.short_description: You cannot select a cut-off server unless you click in the lower corners of the icon
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll through the server list so that a server icon is cut off but will still expand on hover - Click on server - Server will not be selected unless you click on the lower corners of the expanded icon.
